xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: function dba:db-drop ( $names as xs:string* ) as empty-sequence() { try { $names ! db:drop(.), util:redirect($dba:CAT, map { 'info': util:info($names, 'database', 'dropped') }) } catch * { util:redirect($dba:CAT, map { 'error': $err:description }) } }
